Sentencas: The feasibility of adding glass or inorganic binder to conventional SOFC cathode contact materials (CCM) in order to improve bonding to adjacent materials in the cell stack is assessed.
Titulo: Mechanical and electrochemical performance of composite cathode contact materials for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Two glasses (SEM-COM SCZ-8 and Schott GM31107) and one inorganic binder (Aremco 644A) are mixed with LSM particles to produce composite CCM pastes.
Titulo: Mechanical and electrochemical performance of composite cathode contact materials for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: These are used to bond Mn1.5Co1.5O4-coated stainless steel mesh current collectors to anode-supported button cells.
Titulo: Mechanical and electrochemical performance of composite cathode contact materials for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The cells are operated at 800 degrees C for about 1000 h. The cell with SCZ-8 addition to the CCM displays quite stable operation (3.9%/1000 h degradation), whereas the other additives lead to somewhat higher degradation rate.
Titulo: Mechanical and electrochemical performance of composite cathode contact materials for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Bonding of the CCM to coated stainless steel coupons is also assessed.
Titulo: Mechanical and electrochemical performance of composite cathode contact materials for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Interfacial fracture toughness is determined using a four-point bend test.
Titulo: Mechanical and electrochemical performance of composite cathode contact materials for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The fracture toughness for LSM-Schott glass (12.3 N mm(-1)), LSM-SCZ-8 glass (6.8 N mm(-1)) and LSM-644A binder (5.4 N mm(-1)) are significantly improved relative to pure LSM (1.7 N mm(-1)).
Titulo: Mechanical and electrochemical performance of composite cathode contact materials for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Indeed, addition of binder or glass is found to improve bonding of the CCM layer without sacrificing cell performance.
Titulo: Mechanical and electrochemical performance of composite cathode contact materials for solid oxide fuel cells
Mechanical and electrochemical performance of composite cathode contact materials for solid oxide fuel cells
